author: USA TODAY
title: Live from the 2017 Academy Awards
text:

You may also like these photo galleries: Replay Jimmy Kimmel hosts a star-studded night at the 89th Academy Awards Sunday. (Photo: Mike Nelson, EPA) CONNECT COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Break out the bubbly and shine up the golden guys: Oscar night is upon us once again. 
With a leading 14 total nominations, the critically acclaimed musical La La Land aims for a record-breaking night at the 89th Academy Awards, airing live (8:30 p.m. ET/5:30 PT) from Hollywood's Dolby Theatre on ABC. Jimmy Kimmel hosts the show, where Moonlight and Hidden Figures are in the mix to potentially upset La La Land for best picture, Denzel Washington and Casey Affleck tussle for best actor, Emma Stone tries to hold off a surging Isabelle Huppert for best actress, and a Viola Davis win for supporting actress seems like the surest thing at the Oscars. 
Check back for a minute-by-minute (ET) breakdown of the festivities. Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/2mtAt2H NEVER MISS OUT Life Be a pop culture maven.
